ReviewR 2.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Render REDCap Instrument

Source: R/render_redcap_instrument.R
render_redcap_instrument.Rd

Collection of functions to map REDCap question types to native Shiny widgets.

reviewr_textInput(id, field_label, value = NULL, placeholder = NULL, ...)

reviewr_dateInput(id, field_label, value = NULL, ...)

reviewr_dropdown(id, field_label, required, choices, value = NULL, ...)

reviewr_truefalse(id, field_label, required, value = NULL, ...)

reviewr_yesno(id, field_label, required, value = NULL, ...)

reviewr_radio(id, field_label, required, choices, value = NULL, ...)

reviewr_checkbox(id, field_label, choices, value = NULL, ...)

reviewr_notes(id, field_label, value = NULL, ...)

reviewr_integer(id, field_label, value = NULL, ...)

render_redcap(
  reviewr_type,
  field_name,
  field_label,
  required,
  choices,
  current_subject_data = NULL
)

Arguments

id

Unique REDCap question identifier
field_label

Question text, with formatting
value

Default value or previous data if question has previously been answered
placeholder

Placeholder text to help a reviewer decide how to answer the question
...

Any additional parameters
required

Is this a required REDCap question type?
choices

REDCap choices for the question.
current_subject_data

Previous REDCap data on the current subject

Contents

  • Arguments
